articles.author: Hannah Ellis-Petersen, Sophie Zeldin-O'Neill
articles.title: Covering India’s Covid crisis: ‘Hundreds of journalists have lost their lives’ - The Guardian
articles.description: Our South Asia correspondent reflects on a catastrophe that is now affecting the lives of almost everyone in the country
articles.content: You recently lost a close colleague, Kakoli Bhattacharya, to Covid-19. Can you tell us about her and the important work that she did? Kakoli was the Guardians news assistant over here and had worked … [+11150 chars]

articles.title: Singapore ranks 4th out of 28 in world with most number of B1617 Indian variant cases - The Online Citizen Asia
articles.description: The Online Citizen Asia Singapore ranks 4th out of 28 in world with most number of B1617 Indian variant cases Current Affairs
articles.content:
According to the latest information on GISAID website today (3 May), the B1617 double mutation variant found in India has now reached close to 30 countries in the world, including Singapore.

articles.title: Get your shot, steady pom pi pi: Phua Chu Kang is back with infectious Covid-19 vaccine bop - AsiaOne

articles.title: Experts Fear China Could Use Its Space Station For Military Use, Trigger A New ‘Space Race’ - EurAsian Times
articles.description: With the launch of the core module (Tianhe) of its first space station, China has cemented its place as an undisputed space power.
articles.content:
